column1: Table S12. The features selected by ABESS. The features whose values fully coincide on the given dataset split were unified and were treated as one feature during the selection process. All features were enumerated for each drug and the same IDs were assigned to the features constituting unified ones.

column10: Number of sensitive isolates in which the event hasn’t happen
column11: Number of resistant isolates in which the event hasn’t happened
column12: Number of sensitive isolates in which the event has happened
column13: Number of resistant isolates in which the event has happened
column14: Number of splits in which the feature was selected
